info.name: FitTracker Spring API
info.description: Postman collection for testing FitTracker Spring Boot application REST APIs. This collection includes endpoints for authentication, workout management, and exercise browsing.

item.name: Authentication
item.description: Endpoints for user authentication and registration

request.description:
Register a new user account. Returns authentication token and user details.

**Note:** Pre-seeded users (already available):
- Username: raj, Password: password123
- Username: sham, Password: password123

**Validations:**
- Username: 3-50 characters, required
- Email: valid email format, required
- Password: minimum 6 characters, required
- Full name: required

**Response includes:**
- JWT token
- User ID
- Username
- Email
- Full name

Authenticate user and receive JWT token for accessing protected endpoints.

**Pre-seeded test users:**
- Username: **raj**, Password: **password123**
- Username: **sham**, Password: **password123**

**Request Body:**
- Username: required
- Password: required

**Response includes:**
- JWT token (save this for authenticated requests)
- User ID
- Username
- Email
- Full name

Get the profile information of the currently authenticated user.

**Authentication:** Required (JWT Bearer token)

**Returns:** Current user details
- User ID
- Username
- Email
- Full name

**Note:** No token is returned with this endpoint, only user profile data.

Retrieve all available exercises in the system.

**Authentication:** Required (JWT Bearer token)

**Returns:** Array of exercise objects including:
- ID
- Name
- Description
- Category (CARDIO, STRENGTH, FLEXIBILITY, BALANCE, SPORTS)
- Muscle group (CHEST, BACK, SHOULDERS, ARMS, LEGS, CORE, FULL_BODY)
- Instructions

Retrieve details of a specific exercise by ID.

**Authentication:** Required (JWT Bearer token)

**Path Parameter:**
- id: Exercise ID (Long)

**Returns:** Exercise object with complete details

Filter exercises by category.

**Authentication:** Required (JWT Bearer token)

**Path Parameter - category (enum):**
- CARDIO
- STRENGTH
- FLEXIBILITY
- BALANCE
- SPORTS

**Returns:** Array of exercises in the specified category

Filter exercises by target muscle group.

**Authentication:** Required (JWT Bearer token)

**Path Parameter - muscleGroup (enum):**
- CHEST
- BACK
- SHOULDERS
- ARMS
- LEGS
- CORE
- FULL_BODY

**Returns:** Array of exercises targeting the specified muscle group

  "userId": 1,

  ]
}

request.description:
Create a new workout session with exercises.

**Authentication:** Required (JWT Bearer token)

**Request Body:**
- userId: Auto-filled from authenticated user
- name: Workout name (max 100 chars, required)
- description: Workout description (max 500 chars, optional)
- scheduledDate: ISO 8601 datetime format (optional)
- status: PENDING, COMPLETED, or CANCELLED (default: PENDING)
- comments: Additional notes (optional)
- exercises: Array of exercises (min 1 required)
  - exerciseId: Reference to exercise (required)
  - sets: Number of sets (min 1, required)
  - repetitions: Reps per set (min 1, required)
  - weight: Weight in kg (min 0, optional)
  - durationMinutes: Duration for cardio (min 0, optional)
  - orderIndex: Exercise order (min 0, required)

**Returns:** Created workout with all details

Retrieve all workouts for the authenticated user.

**Authentication:** Required (JWT Bearer token)

**Returns:** Array of workout objects including:
- Workout details (id, name, description, dates, status)
- Associated exercises with sets, reps, weight, etc.
- User information

Retrieve a specific workout by ID (must belong to authenticated user).

**Authentication:** Required (JWT Bearer token)

**Path Parameter:**
- id: Workout ID (Long)

**Access Control:** Only accessible by the workout owner

**Returns:** Complete workout details with exercises

Retrieve all active (non-cancelled, non-completed) workouts for the authenticated user.

**Authentication:** Required (JWT Bearer token)

**Returns:** Array of active workout objects

Filter workouts by status for the authenticated user.

**Authentication:** Required (JWT Bearer token)

**Path Parameter - status (enum):**
- PENDING: Scheduled or upcoming workouts
- COMPLETED: Finished workouts
- CANCELLED: Cancelled workouts

**Returns:** Array of workouts matching the status

request.description:
Update an existing workout (must belong to authenticated user).

**Authentication:** Required (JWT Bearer token)

**Path Parameter:**
- id: Workout ID (Long)

**Request Body (all fields optional):**
- name: Updated workout name (max 100 chars)
- description: Updated description (max 500 chars)
- scheduledDate: New scheduled date (ISO 8601)
- status: Updated status (PENDING, COMPLETED, CANCELLED)
- comments: Updated comments
- exercises: Updated exercise list (replaces existing)

**Access Control:** Only the workout owner can update

**Returns:** Updated workout details

Delete a workout (must belong to authenticated user).

**Authentication:** Required (JWT Bearer token)

**Path Parameter:**
- id: Workout ID (Long)

**Access Control:** Only the workout owner can delete

**Returns:** 204 No Content on success
